index.title: Michael Quoc | Architect of Axiomatic Intelligence
index.description: Founder of Demand.io. Building sovereign systems to force AI out of probabilistic hallucination and into absolute certainty.

ferrari-brand.title: The Physics of the Ferrari Brand
ferrari-brand.description: A first-principles deconstruction of Ferrari's brand mechanics: scarcity economics, tribal psychology, and signaling theory.

axiomatic-intelligence.title: Axiomatic Intelligence: A Post-Probabilistic Architecture
axiomatic-intelligence.description: A categorical shift from Probabilistic Intelligence (Summarization) to Axiomatic Intelligence (Adjudication). We introduce the Kinetic Refinery, the Quad-Vector collision, and the Cryptographic Diode.

arc-protocol.title: The ARC Protocol | Adversarial Reasoning Cycle
arc-protocol.description: A systematic framework for deconstructing complex problems into irreducible laws. The core operating system of Demand.io.

analog-protocol.title: The Analog Protocol | Kinetic Intelligence
analog-protocol.description: Why the System Architect needs the Machine. Cars, Tennis, and Music as essential counterbalances to digital abstraction.

kinetic_01.title: Spatial Physics | Kinetic Intelligence
kinetic_01.description: Architecture as programming. Balancing aesthetics, Feng Shui, and utility to create a 'Low Entropy' environment.

kinetic_02.title: Gravity Management | Kinetic Intelligence
kinetic_02.description: Forced mindfulness. The discipline of finding flow in high-consequence terrain.

kinetic_03.title: Harmonic Integrity | Kinetic Intelligence
kinetic_03.description: Analog mastery. A creative loop that requires zero digital intervention.

kinetic_04.title: Adversarial Composure | Kinetic Intelligence
kinetic_04.description: The Science of 8 Limbs. Algorithmic calm under direct physical threat.

kinetic_05.title: Hydrostatic Exploration | Kinetic Intelligence
kinetic_05.description: The regulator protocol. Panic at depth is fatal; calm is mandatory.
